::Lord Elder/Grimlock::
=A0
Elder hears Legacy over the comm. He opens up o=
n the Maximal/Autobot channels.
=A0
Elder: Concentrait all fire on the Mini=
on Lieutenants commanding the Sweeps.
=A0
Elder and Grimlock begin fireing =
on said Minions. The shuttle and Ark weapons do the same.
=A0
::Lord Jhiaxu=
s::
=A0
Jhiaxus notices where the Maixmals are concentraiting their fire an=
d turns about, opening laser fire on the same targets.
=A0
::Scorponok::
=
=A0
Scorponok is overwhelmed by the multiple attackers and falls back, land=
ing on his back. As Sweeps come in closer to strike again Scorponok unleash=
es a full weapon batteries onslaught.
=A0
::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
As Cyclonus =
hit the ground Rodimus had changer to vehical mode and was heading for his =
opponent. As Cyc's laser blasts come at him, Rodimus transforms to bot mode=
, leaping over the lasers. He is close to Cyclonus, coming at him in a flyi=
ng kick position.

--- On Thu, 7/17/08, supercyclonus <supercyclonus@yahoo.=
com> wrote:

From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
Subject: Re: The=
 War of the ARK!
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, July 17, 2008, =
5:22 PM






The firepower from Grimlock and Lord Elder hold several sweep=
s at bay 
as 20 sweep craft streaked over from the main host led by Scourge=
, 
Tummult, Darkfate and Nightstrike. 

Concentrated defenses from the Ark =
and the shuttle quickly begin to 
whittle into this number as several sweep=
s disappeared in bright 
explosions of metal and smoke! 

Scourge and Tummu=
lt spread out into wide arcs allowing the sweeps to 
move forward in an att=
empt to `soften up' the defending maximals, 
even as their own cannons rota=
te on their more stationary foes and 
unleash a deadly cacophony of power a=
t their apparently defenseless 
opponents . . . . . . an attack that never =
reaches its target! As 
the disintegration beams from the sweeps reach the =
last few meters to 
the ark they impact and are rebuffed by some sort of po=
werful force 
shield, leaving the ark unscathed. 

"DESTROY THE LEADERSHIP =
AND THE SWEEPS WILL FALL" A familiar voice 
sounds across Lord Elder's radi=
o. 

"I HAVE TAPPED ARK ENERGY STORES, AND HAVE SUFFICIENT ENERGY RESERVES =

NOW TO MAINTAIN THIS SHIELDING FOR A SHORT PERIOD." 

Cannon fire from Leg=
acy brightened the skies for a moment as it 
passes through his own shieldi=
ng and destroyed a sweep craft that 
ventured too close. "IF THE ARK IS DAM=
AGED BEYOND A CERTAIN POINT WE 
MAY LOOSE EVERYTHING EVEN IF WE RETAIN THE =
MATRIX."

As Scorponok stood to his full height sweeps seemed to swarm on h=
im 
from several different directions, several of them cut down almost 
imm=
ediately by his machine gun batteries. With a swipe of his mighty 
pincer S=
corponok is ably to capture a sweep, his claw biting deeply 
into its armor=
. 

As Scorponok looked around he can clearly see 9 more sweeps around 
him=
, several of them orienting on him and fire a deadly barrage of 
laser fire=
 at him!

> Jhiaxus pulls up high and tries to drop more cluster bombs.
>
>=
 Jhiaxus: So many of them! How do we dog such an enemy?!

Myrmidon chuckled=
 darkly, "When a predator takes on a prey more 
numerous and nearly as powe=
rful as he, then he must choose his victim 
carefully."

Myrmidon, still in=
 star-fighter mode shifted angles and launched 
rockets at the sweeps, addi=
ng to the cluster bombs Jhiaxus already 
had in the air. Several sweeps exp=
loded as others veered off. 

"It may be wise for all of us to co-ordinate =
our attacks. With two of 
us here and others in other places, these minions=
 can separate us and 
pick us off at their leisure."

Even as he spoke, sev=
eral sweeps fired strafing shots at the two 
aerial Decepticons!

As Hydras=
, Perceptor and Darkhawk opened fire against the sweeps the 
reactions was =
swift and direct! 15 sweeps separated themselves from 
the host and moved a=
t Hydras and his crew as fusion grenades flew 
through the air at them!

> =
Hydras shouted by com link "PREDACONS AND DECEPTICONS! !! PROTECT 
THE 
> A=
RK!!!"

"WILL YOU SHUT UP!!!!!!" came an unfamiliar female voice boomed 
lo=
udly over Hydras' channel! (OOC: Decibel) "You could have been one 
of us, =
but now you will be cannon fodder! *DIE!!*"

Twin sonic missiles streak tow=
ards Hydras' shuttle, even as a high 
pitched scream can be heard over the =
radio, effectively squelching 
communications. 

((OOC: Anyone communicatin=
g into or out from the area near Hydras, 
Perceptor and Darkhawk (might cov=
er Scorpi, Myrmidon and Jhiaxus as 
well =96 not sure how close together th=
ey are) will only hear a high 
pitched shriek))

Cyclonus frowned inwardly =
as he saw his attack thwarted by Rodimus. 
With a quick boost of power Cycl=
onus banked around in an attempt to 
line up another shot. Using his superi=
or speed over Rodimus he 
maneuvered to dodge the weapons fire, but clearly=
 underestimated his 
foe! The first shot missed - as it was designed to do,=
 the bright 
lights distracting and partially blinding him! The blindness a=
llows 
the second one to hit him in the under plating knocking him to the 
=
side as he began to fall from the air. 

In a desperate maneuver Cyclonus s=
hifted to his robot form as he 
crashed on the ground, his legs barely gett=
ing beneath him before he 
hits absorbing the impact. 

A lesser robot woul=
d have taken severe damage, and as it is Cyclonus' 
armor is dented from hi=
s unexpected landing, but Cyclonus quickly 
stands his face cool and calm a=
s he observed his opponent. 

"It would seem your recent um modifications h=
ave not dulled your 
edge." Cyclonus' voice echoed across to Rodimus, "Good=
!" 

With a quick movement Cyclonus fired twined laser cannons at Rodimus 
=
as he smiled; it was good to have a worthy opponent!

 














     =
